subject: Re: [junit] taglibs with JUnit/Cactus
msgSnippet: ... What are you trying to verify? 1. The TagHandler is correct. 2. Your JSPs use the taglib correctly. 3. The taglib is deployed correctly. (TLD) Anything
messageBody:
>So said a_harshe2003 on 2003-08-12 --------------------
>Hello,
> I am searching for some good examples for testing different taglibs
>under JUnit.
>I have seen the examples under
>http://jakarta.apache.org/cactus/writing/howto_testcase_jsp.html
>But couldnot find much fruitful.
>I will be very greatful,If anybody post a simple example with
>TestCase class and JSP.
>or just give the net link.

What are you trying to verify?

1. The TagHandler is correct.
2. Your JSPs use the taglib correctly.
3. The taglib is deployed correctly. (TLD)

Anything else?

Take care.


J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
